name: Not so Chill
description:
OVERVIEW: 

Global warming is here, and it’s not so chill! Can you cool down the sun and keep your iceberg from melting using the limited snow you have? Give it your all and see if you can pengWIN!

CONTROLS:

WASD - move

Space - pick up or place a snowball

Q and E - rotate

POWERUPS:

Water Bottle - 2 extra snowballs

Balloon - Float for 5 seconds

Sun Hat - Stop the sun’s heat for 5 seconds

OBJECTIVES: 

Don’t fall into the water

Look for power ups to help you

Keep the sun from melting your iceberg too quickly by loading the cannon with snowballs

Survive until a snowstorm so that you can rebuild your iceberg
